approach.title: Who I Am
approach.subtitle1: I build web products at the intersection of engineering, UX, and long-term thinking.
approach.subtitle2: Focusing on clarity, performance, and systems that scale without losing their human touch.
descriptions: Clear communication and intuitive design that makes complex systems easy to understand.
Optimized performance and scalability that handles growth without compromise.
Thoughtful user experiences that balance functionality with elegance.

principles.title: Strategic Planning
principles.description: I begin every project with thorough research and planning, ensuring alignment with business goals and user needs.

principles.title: Clean Architecture
principles.description: I believe in writing maintainable, scalable code that follows best practices and design patterns.

principles.title: Iterative Development
principles.description: Continuous improvement through testing, feedback, and refinement leads to exceptional results.

principles.title: Performance First
principles.description: Optimization is not an afterthought. I build with performance and scalability in mind from day one.

projects.title: What I Do
projects.subtitle: I work across the full web stack, focusing on reliable, scalable systems that are easy to evolve.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Senior Engineer · Frontend · UX · Full-Stack
about.description: I’m a senior frontend-focused full-stack engineer with over a decade of experience building production-grade web applications. I specialize in modern React and Next.js architectures, high-quality UI/UX, and scalable backend systems. I care deeply about clarity, performance, and maintainability — with a strong focus on turning complexity into simple, intuitive user experiences.

achievements: Led development of enterprise SaaS platform serving 10,000+ users
Reduced application load time by 60% through optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 75%
Introduced TypeScript and modern development practices
Developed responsive web applications for major brands
Improved accessibility scores to AAA standard

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: Happy to talk about building great products.
